patthana18.20:4.1: Āsavavippayuttaṃ sāsavaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavavippayutto naanāsavo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana18.20:5.1: Āsavavippayuttaṃ anāsavaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavavippayutto naanāsavo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana18.20:5.4: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe dve … pe … avigate cattāri.
patthana18.20:6.1: Āsavavippayuttaṃ sāsavaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavavippayutto naanāsavo nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.20:6.2: Āsavavippayuttaṃ anāsavaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca āsavavippayutto nasāsavo nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
